unnormalised: Arre, India ani Pakistan-acho match 15/10/2024-ak asa, barabor? Mhaka umed asa 02/09/2024-ak zal'lea match bhaxen paus poddonam; tem dhuvun gel'lem!
normalised: Arre, India ani Pakistan pandra October don hazar chovisak asa, barem? Asha asa dusrea September don hazar chovisacher zalem tea match bhaxen paus poddonk favona; tem poornn dhuvun ghetele!
